mapper.sql: id, sub_task_num, sub_task_typ, sub_task_seq, main_task_num, main_task_seq, main_task_type, group_flag, task_group_code, create_date, task_msg, send_status, remark, need_confirm, need_inform, need_trigger, trigger_type, condition_handler, third_invoke_type, third_type, app_code, third_url, third_start_method, third_end_method, point_access, sequence, cancel_flag, cancel_id, cancel_type, date_chg, group_id, loop_exec, priority, task_status, map_code, pod_code, pod_dir, start_bercode, start_x, start_y, end_bercode, end_x, end_y, end_remark, worker_task_code, area_code, sub_task_biz_prop, robot_code, work_task_status, task_start_time, task_leave_time, task_end_time, send_time,start_alias,end_alias, start_bercode_auto, end_bercode_auto,templ_code, task_leave_time, task_end_time, send_time,start_alias,end_alias, start_bercode_auto, end_bercode_auto, end_map_code, json_data
mapper.select:
select
from ts_sub_task where main_task_num = #{mainTaskNum,jdbcType= VARCHAR} order by sub_task_seq ASC

select
from ts_sub_task where sub_task_num = #{subTaskNum} LIMIT 1
mapper.update:
update ts_sub_task set priority = #{priority} where sub_task_num in
#{item}

update ts_sub_task
worker_task_code = #{workerTaskCode},
robot_code = #{robotCode},
task_start_time = #{taskStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_leave_time = #{taskLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_end_time = #{taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where worker_task_code = #{workerTaskCode}

update ts_sub_task
work_task_status = #{workTaskStatus},
robot_code = #{robotCode},
task_start_time = #{taskStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_leave_time = #{taskLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_end_time = #{taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sub_task_num = #{subTaskNum}

update ts_sub_task
work_task_status = #{subTask.workTaskStatus},
robot_code = #{subTask.robotCode},
task_start_time = #{subTask.taskStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_leave_time = #{subTask.taskLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_end_time = #{subTask.taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sub_task_num = #{subTask.subTaskNum} and work_task_status = #{currentStatus}
mapper.select:
select
from ts_sub_task where worker_task_code = #{taskCode} order by id desc LIMIT 1

select
from ts_sub_task where worker_task_code = #{taskCode} order by sub_task_seq ASC

select
from ts_sub_task where work_task_status != #{endStatus} and send_time is not null and send_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)

select
from ts_sub_task where task_status != #{taskStatus} and send_time is not null and send_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
select count(*) from ts_sub_task where task_status = '0' or task_status = 0
select count(*) from ts_sub_task where task_status = '1' or task_status = 1
select count(*) from ts_sub_task where task_status = '9' or task_status = 9

select COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS dateList, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as hours FROM ts_sub_task WHERE task_status = 9 or task_status = '9' GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');

select COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS dateList, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as hours FROM ts_sub_task WHERE task_status = 1 or task_status = '1' GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');
